description.zh-cn: 台湾眼科医师、政治人物，为台湾民众党籍，是柯文哲的胞妹。
description.en: A Taiwanese ophthalmologist and politician, member of the Taiwan People's Party, and the younger sister of Ko Wen-je.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，台湾民众党的创党主席，柯美兰的胞兄。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician, founding chairman of the Taiwan People's Party, and the elder brother of Ko Mei-lan.

description.zh-cn: 柯美兰与柯文哲的父亲。
description.en: The father of Ko Mei-lan and Ko Wen-je.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，时任新竹市长。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician, serving as the mayor of Hsinchu City at the time.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的政党之一，由柯文哲创立。
description.en: A political party in Taiwan, founded by Ko Wen-je.

description.zh-cn: 柯承发是柯美兰的父亲。
description.en: Ko Cheng-fa is the father of Ko Mei-lan.

description.zh-cn: 柯美兰是柯文哲的胞妹。
description.en: Ko Mei-lan is the younger sister of Ko Wen-je.

description.zh-cn: 柯美兰出生于台湾新竹市北区。
description.en: Ko Mei-lan was born in North District, Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 柯美兰是台湾民众党籍党员，并曾担任第一、二届党员代表。
description.en: Ko Mei-lan is a member of the Taiwan People's Party and served as a party representative for the first and second terms.

relationships.target: 国际奥比斯眼科飞机医院

description.zh-cn: 于2023年10月12日宣布以不经政党推荐的形式参选2024年新竹市选举区的立法委员，但最终未能当选。
description.en: On October 12, 2023, she announced her candidacy for the legislative seat in the Hsinchu City constituency for the 2024 election as an independent, but was not elected.

description.zh-cn: 在2024年台湾大选前，与胞兄柯文哲和时任新竹市长高虹安一同出席民众党的造势活动。
description.en: Before the 2024 Taiwan general election, attended a Taiwan People's Party rally with her brother Ko Wen-je and then-Hsinchu City Mayor Ann Kao.

description.zh-cn: 在2024年台湾大选前，与胞妹柯美兰和时任新竹市长高虹安一同出席民众党的造势活动。
description.en: Before the 2024 Taiwan general election, attended a Taiwan People's Party rally with his sister Ko Mei-lan and then-Hsinchu City Mayor Ann Kao.

description.zh-cn: 卫生署新竹医院曾隶属于卫生署，该机构后改制为中华民国卫生福利部。
description.en: Hsinchu Hospital was affiliated with the Department of Health, which was later reorganized into the Ministry of Health and Welfare.

description.zh-cn: 国立台湾大学医学院是国立台湾大学下属的学院之一。
description.en: The College of Medicine is one of the colleges under National Taiwan University.

relationships.source: 国立台湾大学医学院附设医院新竹分院

description.zh-cn: 国立台湾大学医学院附设医院新竹分院是国立台湾大学医学院附设医院的分院，隶属于国立台湾大学系统。
description.en: The Hsinchu Branch of National Taiwan University Hospital is a branch of the National Taiwan University Hospital, affiliated with the National Taiwan University system.
